result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Atty Ric Zoellner has agreed to take this case as a Dean appointment.

1:23 PM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Stephanie S. Farvour in court. Court makes stmt. SPD has not been able to find counsel. Defendant requesting the Court to appoint counsel. Court advises defendant to complete PFAc and file w/ the Court. Defendant to note all finances and repayment amount in the paperwork. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on November 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:34 PM  Prosecuting attorney John Luetscher in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Stephanie S. Farvour in court.  SDP not able to find counsel to represent the defendant. Defendant request the Court to appoint. Court allows more time for SPD to appoint. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:21 PM Defendant Stephanie S. Farvour in court.  Atty Spansail appeared in court for today only. Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. SPD needs to check for conflicts. Court makes stmt. DA Burke makes stmt. Defendant to provide documentation to DA's office for reason of delay in next hearing. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
